content: Back in Grove 46, Sentomaru reports back to his base, mentioning he managed to capture Demaro Black and most of Demaro's recruited pirates except for the Caribou Pirates and the other Straw Hat Imposters (sans Cocoa and Fake Chopper), who somehow disappeared from the plaza. He also comments on the Straw Hats' newfound strength after easily destroying the two Pacifistas he brought along with him and tells his base to call Marine Headquarters in the New World and warn them that the Straw Hats have finally revived.
